The Pit Lord lets loose a terrifying howl that reduces nearby enemy units' attack damage by <ANht,DataA4,%>% for <ANht,Dur4> seconds.
The Pit Lord lets loose a terrifying howl that reduces nearby enemy units' attack damage by <ANht,DataA5,%>% for <ANht,Dur5> seconds.
The Pit Lord lets loose a terrifying howl that reduces nearby enemy units' attack damage by <ANht,DataA6,%>% for <ANht,Dur6> seconds.
Applies Cripple to enemy units within a range of 700, reducing their movement speed by 75%, attack rate by 50%, and damage by 50% for 15 seconds.
